issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
On iOS platform,Application crashes intermittently when launched.

This is not a regression.It even occurs on 2.1.0

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Install the attached project on device.
2. launch the installed app.

Expected Result:
Application should launch successfully

Actual Result:
Splash screen is shown and then application crashes.Find attached the crash log
fields.summary: iOS: Window - Application crashes intermittently when launched.
fields.environment:
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.1.v20120723131610
Tested with Titanium Â Studio: 2.1.1.201207171343
iOS Device: iPhone 3GS (5.0)
OS: Mac OSX 10.7.3
